## If you still see warnings
- Confirm you pulled the latest workflows (no more fallback placeholders).
- Ensure VSCode is signed into GitHub and the Actions extension is enabled.
- Reload the window (`Developer: Reload Window`).
- Share a screenshot if warnings persist so we can reproduce.
